adrFormatAddress: 235 W 48th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: As a residential real estate salesperson, I can confidently say that the Ritz Plaza is one of my favorite buildings to work with. The leasing team consistently makes everyone feel welcome and patiently answers all questions, ensuring clients have all the necessary information to make informed decisions. Moving and finding a place in NYC can be stressful, but the Ritz Plaza's team turns it into a smooth process. Senior leasing manager Geraldine Sison goes above and beyond her job description to accommodate both me and my clients. Her service is truly first-class, even during busy seasons. Many of my clients residing at this building renew their lease, and a large percentage have lived there for multiple years. I highly recommend the Ritz Plaza for a  perfect home in New York City!

text.text: As a residential real estate salesperson, I can confidently say that the Ritz Plaza is one of my favorite buildings to work with. originalText.text: After 8 years at the Ritz Plaza, I am still impressed by the incredibly friendly and professional staff and leasing office. The building's maintenance is impeccable, and any issues are promptly addressed. A rare gem in the heart of the city that never sleeps.

text.text: After 8 years at the Ritz Plaza, I am still impressed by the incredibly friendly and professional staff and leasing office. The building's maintenance is impeccable, and any issues are promptly addressed. A rare gem in the heart of the city that never sleeps.

originalText.text: Great building, amazing staff, easy access to transportation, groceries, one block away, Hurleys Saloon and Masseria Caffe are both excellent and sooo close. This was definitely the best apartment I've ever rented. Recommend the North side of the building. The sun reflects off the buildings across the way ALL DAY and you get bright sunlight without the heat of the southern exposure.

originalText.text: A dream!!!!! Dream apartment. Dream building. Dream everything! Frank is phenomenal and helped me with my move in process. Everything was seamless. The staff feels like my family. They’re simply amazing humans who greet me with a smile and positive energy every time I go to and from my apartment. I’ve never felt more at home. I don’t ever want to leave. The amenities are amazing. State of the art gym, amazing staff EVERYWHERE. Amazing rooftop, beautiful lounge and prime location. Honestly in love. Best part is I have a BALCONY!!!!!! How cool is that? It’s rare to have a balcony in NYC with sick views. 10/10!!!!!! Thanks Frank for helping me move into my dream place.

originalText.text: This place robs you for your money. They crossed off my ticket. I drive a white jeep and I arrived to park my car at 4:42pm and stayed over night and it suppose to be $67 but they charged me $81. I will pay for the price it’s the fact that they switch my ticket out.  I picked up my car at 3:02pm the next day. The Nissan car we arrived at the same time as me and paid $67 but they crossed out the white jaguar car for my white jeep as you can see. The white jaguar parked at 3:03pm. They said they can’t find my ticket and this is my ticket. The number he told me to call which I provided a picture of is not the number you call “customer service” They rip you off and their customer service is terrible. I will never recommend. I don’t trust them
